overview_of_class: Japanese I (JAPANESE 111-1, 2 and 3) is a yearlong course that covers the first half of college level elementary Japanese.  In Japanese I, students will develop the four skills (speaking, listening, reading, and writing) and also learn many aspects of Japanese culture and society through various in-class activities, written assignments, and video viewing.  Careful and thorough review and preparation for each class session are expected.
name: Japanese I
class_attributes:
Prerequisites apply, see description

Specific requirements in the language
subject: JAPANESE
